metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5804 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: A type confusion error within the "identify()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.8 can be exploited to trigger a division by zero.

criterions.comment: darktable package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.11-1').
rawtherapee package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
